refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the polyphonic after-touch pressure of the selected note number.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: polyaft returns the polyphonic pressure of the selected note number, optionally mapped to an user-specified range.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: inote -- note number. Normally set to the value returned by notnum

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para: Here is an example of the polyaft opcode. It uses the file polyaft.csd.
Don't forget that you must include the -F flag when using an external MIDI file like polyaft.mid.

example.title: Example of the polyaft opcode.
example.para: See the sections Real-time Audio and Command Line Flags for more information on using command line flags.
